name: Blooming Bounty Bouquet
description: What do we do when we want to show our thankfulness? We send a card, a gift or something like that. But the most traditional thing that we do is to present flowers. They are a universal gift and believe us - even if you are not a fan, it doesn't matter because it is very pleasant to receive flowers.
